description.lang: NuTone Smart Home Series Standard Smart Home Series Controller Monitor, turn on/off or schedule anything connected through the hub from anywhere in the world with one, easy-to-use app.Pick 100 of your favorite Wi-Fi and Z-Wave devices to connect.Easily control your entire home with one touch settings for Home, Away, Night and Vacation.Works with major brands including nest, Schlage, Yale, NuTone, Kwikset, First Alert, plus many more
